1425: 1. We may deliver any notice instead of mailing it. Proof of mailing of any notice shall be sufficient proof of notice.
1426: 2. If this policy is cancelled, you may be entitled to a premium refund. If so, we will send you the refund. The premium refund, if any, will be computed according to our manuals. However, making or offering to make the refund is not a condition of cancellation.
1427: 3. The effective date of cancellation stated in the notice shall become the end of the policy period.
